name: Shoot or Shout! 2021
description:
Finally my precious little project came to an end. I uploaded a much more primitive version of it at the beginning of the year and I fell in love with the absurd idea and decided to polish it into a full fledged game! And finally I can say, that Shoot or Shout has been polished and finished! Defend yourself from the hordes of zombies with our little no name Cowboy and Clown, and collect as many points as possible in the cold dark dungeons made with a retro, 2D style!
Be sure to launch the game in fullscreen!

Be sure to check out my portfolio (it's still in development):
https://www.behance.net/sndorcserni
Or my Youtube channel where I'll be uploading various game dev related videos:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdvUhlVq9DbMbJwCMg_GxFA

I'm open to any critique and I hope you'll have fun! :)
